name: Heist (itch)
description:
James has been a thief for a long time now, usually breaking into homes and small shops. Now it time for his biggest heist yet! The tower heist...

Dodge guards and sneak around the building. Reach elevators to progress.

8 difficult and stressful levels!

Use WASD to move and mouse to look around to sprint hold down left-shift

Music by BenSound.com
